summary: Cool Cat Wiki - The Cool Cat Wiki is the fan-created premier collaborative encyclopedia about the coolest cat around and his creator Derek Savage. It features information about the Cool Cat series of films and books, including characters like Cool Cat, Daddy Derek, Momma Cat, Butch the Bully, Maria, and Dirty Dog. The wiki also includes details about projects by Cool Cat creator Derek Savage, such as a gun-safety documentary for women and a marijuana-themed awards show.
